com.turnout.ws.service

Interface BeaconMasterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeaconMasterServiceImpl

    public interface BeaconMasterService

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONObject beaconInfo(java.lang.String bconId, int stdId)
      This method will get beacon details from database based on studio id and beacon id.
      org.json.simple.JSONArray beaconsList(java.lang.String search)
      This method get all the beacons based on the search string.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject saveBeacon(java.lang.String bconId, int staType, int stdId, java.lang.String detectType, java.lang.String bconStatus)
      This method used to save a beacon details into database.It will return a beacon id (primary key) of just inserted or updated beacon.

    • Method Detail

      • beaconsList

        org.json.simple.JSONArray beaconsList(java.lang.String search)
        This method get all the beacons based on the search string.
        Parameters:
        search - string contains search text.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.

      • beaconInfo

        org.json.simple.JSONObject beaconInfo(java.lang.String bconId,
                                    int stdId)
        This method will get beacon details from database based on studio id and beacon id.
        Parameters:
        bconId - A primary key of beacon element.
        stdId - A primary key of studio element
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of beacon element.

      • saveBeacon

        org.json.simple.JSONObject saveBeacon(java.lang.String bconId,
                                    int staType,
                                    int stdId,
                                    java.lang.String detectType,
                                    java.lang.String bconStatus)
        This method used to save a beacon details into database.It will return a beacon id (primary key) of just inserted or updated beacon.
        Parameters:
        bconId - This string holds beacon unique website address.
        staType - This integer holds studio activity type (event / challenge).
        stdId - This integer holds the unique studio id.
        detectType - This string holds beacon type (Own / Fiternity).
        bconStatus - This string holds beacon status (Active / Inactive).
        Returns:
        it will return just inserted beacon id.
